snippet: A gala held at the Museum of American Finance in Manhattan to honor William B. Harrison Jr., former chairman and chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, attracted a number of old-school Wall Street celebrities.
abstract: A gala held at the Museum of American Finance in Manhattan to honor William B. Harrison Jr., former chairman and chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, attracted a number of old-school Wall Street celebrities.

headline.main: Wall Street's Elite, Including Ina Drew, Honors JPMorgan's Former Leader
